Class RaceCar

java.lang.Object
com.github.ylc.toy.Product
com.github.ylc.toys.RaceCar
public class RaceCar
extends Product
A class for storing RaceCar specific information.
Since:
2020-08-08

1.0.0
Author:
Yue Chen (yuelchen)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    RaceCar​(java.lang.String description)
    Constructor Passes final static product name to parent class, increments the count of TOTAL_RACE_CARS_MADE class variable, assigns the passed description to this race car object and assigns the price to be 0.0; which means it's free by default.
    RaceCar​(java.lang.String description, double price)
    Constructor Passes final static product name to parent class, increments the count of TOTAL_RACE_CARS_MADE class variable and assigns the passed description and price to this race car object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void drift()
    Prints out drifting sound fx when drifting with race car object
    static int getTotalCarsMade()
    Returns the total number of RaceCar objects made since runtime.
    void play()
    Prints out sound fx when playing with race car object.
